ul.li: Default execution: The default environment that uses for executing test scripts.
Log executed test steps: Decide whether the logs include executed test steps or not. Learn more.
Default wait for element timeout (in seconds): The default timeout period that waits for the application under test to be loaded when executing the automation test.

Post-Execution Options: These options decide the actions that performs after finishing test execution.
Open report: Specify whether the report generated after your test suite's execution finishes is to be opened immediately.
Terminate drivers: Specify when any driver remains after execution is terminated.
